meanings.definition: The space in a vehicle where passengers can place their feet.
meanings.sent1: In the car, my sister always rests her feet in the footwell.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally dropped my phone in the footwell of the taxi.
meanings.sent3: During the road trip, we joked that the footwell was a secret hiding spot for snacks.
meanings.sent4: The footwell of the car became a black hole for all the loose change.
meanings.sent5: The footwell was so cramped that I couldn't stretch my legs at all.

meanings.definition: The area at the base of a piece of furniture where feet can be placed.
meanings.sent1: Under the table, there is a cozy footwell for resting tired feet.
meanings.sent2: I like to keep a rug in the footwell of my armchair for extra comfort.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a new favorite napping spot in the footwell of the couch.
meanings.sent4: As I sat on the sofa, I absentmindedly tapped my foot in the footwell.
meanings.sent5: The footwell of the recliner was the perfect hiding spot for my missing sock.
